source: Optuna sweep promotion (trial 160, LANE B with sane constraints)
description: Canonical production policy for Trial 160. Parameters verified on FULLYEAR 2025 with robust edge in both LANE A (AS-IS) and LANE B (SANE-CONSTRAINED).
notes: Spread caps (2000 bps) do not affect results (spread never exceeds threshold in 2025 dataset)

ATR block rate: 14.63% (lowest of all candidates)
Robust edge verified in both AS-IS and SANE-CONSTRAINED lanes
